summary: TL* - THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 CHEVROLET MALIBU.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING  ON 09/23/06 THE STEERING BECAME VERY HARD.  THE CONTACT WAS JUST ABLE TO STEER THE VEHICLE AND PARK IT.  THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED, AND IT WAS FOUND THAT THE STEERING MODULE DID NOT WORK.  THE STEERING MODULE WAS REPLACED  ON 09/27/06.  HOWEVER, BECAUSE THE VEHICLE OWNER BELIEVED THIS WAS A HAZARD  HE WAS   AFRAID TO DRIVE THE VEHICLE.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGE WERE BOTH 10905 MILES.*AK  UPDATE 4/9 *TR
